title: Sonic The Hedgehog IDW Collection Is 60% Off With Limited-Time Amazon Promotion

description: Once Upon a Katamari is a delightful return for the series, offering the same core gameplay fans know and love while also adding even more fun and cleverness.
title: Once Upon A Katamari Review - I Love Mess!
The Star Wars: A New Hope Manga Is Getting A Premium Art Book Edition

description: <
title: The Edward Scissorhands Steelbook 4K Blu-Ray Arrives Just In Time For Halloween
The Ring 4K Blu-Ray Collection Is Over 50% Off, Lowest Price Yet

description:
The Baltimore Ravens have gotten off to a 1-5 start this NFL season, and the coaching staff are apparently making moves to help turn things around, including removing certain items from the locker room, in an effort to help players focus.

According to reports, a series of leisure items--including video games, cornhole boards, a ping pong table, and a basketball hoop--have been removed from the team locker room for the time being.

Writer Sam Cohn of The Baltimore Sun said some Ravens players really enjoyed playing Super Smash Bros. in the locker room, with teammates crowding around to watch, but that's coming to an end for now. Players told The Sun that the coaching staff wanted to remove distractions for the players.

Continue Read
title: NFL's Baltimore Ravens Lose Locker Room Video Games After Tough Start

description:
In 2006, Scarface: The World is Yours was released as an alternate timeline sequel to the classic 1983 film starring Al Pacino as Tony Montana. The game has been unavailable for a long time, but it's recently shown up as a pending re-release on Epic Games Store and Steam. However, no one seems to have heard of the publisher, EC Digital, and it's unclear if it's actually happening.

As reported by PC Gamer, Scarface: The World is Yours was accidentally released early on Epic Games Store, and the game page is still active. It's also listed on
title: Scarface: The World Is Yours PC Re-release Raises More Questions Than Answers

description:
Electronic Arts and the NFL have announced an "expanded, multi-year exclusive agreement" that will see EA continue to make new Madden games for the foreseeable future. EA said this is the "most comprehensive partnership" to date between the two parties.

Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed, but EA said the Madden NFL series will continue and that EA will remain the exclusive developer of "simulation" NFL games. The deal also covers "new content and experiences" for EA's College Football series, along with "new, large-scale interactive experiences for football fans..."
title: EA And NFL Extend Deal For More Madden Games

description:
The idea of exclusive games in 2025 is "antiquated," according to Xbox president Sarah Bond. She said in a new interview that people are beginning to "evolve way past" the idea that a game should be exclusive to one store or device.

"The biggest games in the world are available everywhere. You look at Call of Duty, you look at Minecraft, you look at Fortnite, you look at Roblox ... that's actually what's really driving community in gaming. That's where people gather. And the idea of locking it to one store or one device is antiquated for most people," she told Mashable.

"You want to be able to play with your friends anywhere, regardless of what they're on. And we're really leaning into that with this experience [Rog Ally X]. It just opens up another way for you to play, as does cloud, as
title: Exclusive Games Are "Antiquated," Xbox President Says

description:
Has the vast amount of violence featured in modern games--including Call of Duty and Battlefield 6--ever bothered you? Luckily, Battlefield 6 gives players the option to go near-pacifist with how they navigate warfare. One player has racked up a score of over one million with only eight kills.

ThatFriendlyGuyTTV has become the premier medic across online lobbies for Battlefield 6 with over 5,000 revives. He doesn't mess around with vehicles or weapons for the most part, but you can find him sprinting to players in need whenever he gets the chance.

"That's me--I play games without killing to see if it's possible," he wrote in a comment a few days ago on Reddit. "For anyone interested, I'm now level 42 in 25 hours, I mostly finish top 5 scores in the game, most revives in 1 life is 47,
title: Battlefield 6 Player Racks Up Massive Score Despite Only 8 Kills

description:
Gadgets play a major role in whatever class you decide to use in Battlefield 6. They're essentially the pieces of equipment that you spawn into every life with, and if you use them correctly, you can wreak havoc on the enemy team. Every class in Battlefield 6 offers several exclusive Gadgets for you to choose from, and while you can always stick with the default options, there are some better choices that are waiting to be unlocked.

Below, we'll go over the best Gadgets to use for the four classes in Battlefield 6 so you know exactly what to equip on your loadouts. It's worth noting that this guide pairs well with our best weapons in BF6 guide, naturally.

Table of Contents [hide]
title: Best Gadgets For Each Class In Battlefield 6
A Nightmare On Elm Street 7-Film Collection Has Never Been Cheaper Than It Is Now

description:
Rematch has been a welcome surprise from developer Sloclap, which repurposed the acrobatic movement and target tracking of martial-arts-inspired fighters Absolver and Sifu to make a cooperative third-person soccer "shooter" game. Rematch is currently in the midst of the first season of its live-service run, which implemented tons of bug fixes and the long-requested Ranked 3v3 mode. One of the most requested features still remains absent, however. Since the game launched, players have clamored for Rematch to have a "rematch" button so that teams can try to get revenge on an opponent. And while the feature isn't coming this season (and may not ever happen), Sloclap is aware of the desire, and it's working on it.

"I'm not in any way going to commit to it, but [a rematch button] was originally planned for Season
title: A Rematch Button May Come To Rematch One Day, But Probably Not Until Season 3

description:
Fellowship strips down the standard MMO experience and serves players the best part of the experience: running dungeons and earning cool new gear. It does so with a unique set of heroes that fall within the confines of the holy trinity of tanks, healers, and DPS, ensuring there's a character for every type of player to enjoy.

Though they may fill a specific role, each character in Fellowship has their own set of abilities that set them apart from others within that category--with some being more or less challenging to learn and master. For that reason, there's not really any "best class" in Fellowship, as they all serve unique roles and it'll come down to your task at hand and the team facing it. Below, we'll give you a brief overview of each character in Fellowship and what
title: All Classes And Characters In Fellowship

description:
Arc Raiders is a PvPvE third-person extraction shooter set in an apocalyptic future. In this game, you strap on the boots of a scavenger who must collect valuable resources and gear from dangerous territory overrun with deadly robots and human threats. Like most extraction shooters, this game requires considerable risk to reap the best rewards. Our guide will provide you with some helpful tips for looting and staying alive in Arc Raiders.

Matches in Arc Raiders are called Raids, and they last for 30 minutes each. You can play solo or in a party of up to three players. You'll need to loot up and safely extract with your gear before the match ends in order to keep your stuff. If you’re eliminated or fail to extract, you'll lose everything on you--well, mostly everything, but we'll explain more on that below.

Table of Contents [
title: Arc Raiders Tips: 15 Things To Know Before You Play

description:
Not even quite five years after launching, PS5 has sold more systems in the US than the PS3 ever did. Circana's Mat Piscatella revealed the intriguing tidbit about Sony's current-gen console on BlueSky, though didn't provide exact numbers for comparison.

There were roughly 88 million PS3 systems produced by Sony from 2006 to 2016. In August, Sony revealed that 80 million PS5 units had been sold globally since the console debuted in November 2020. That means it's a question of when, not if PS5 will top PS3 worldwide.
title: PS5 Surpasses Lifetime PS3 Hardware Sales In US

description:
I once had a friend describe Katamari Damacy to me as a "cool uncle game"--a statement I found hilarious considering the person who introduced me to the series was, in fact, my cool uncle. What he meant by this, though, was that while the Katamari series has never quite reached a point of true, mainstream popularity, it's certainly managed to foster a cult following of fans who adore its peculiarity--fans who revel in absurd concepts like "rolling up the world," and seemingly always have some niche-yet-utterly-engrossing New Thing to show you. A fanbase of "cool uncles," if you will.

Though I can't claim to be an uncle and certainly won't claim to be cool, after playing Once Upon a Katamari, I am eager and ready to join their ranks. The newest entry in Bandai Namco's nonsensical action-puzzle series has converted me from a Katamari appreciator to a Katamari fan. Once Upon a Katamari is a joyous return for the long-stagnant series, bringing with it small tw
title: Once Upon A Katamari Review - I Love Mess!

description:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 lets you customize your appearance, clan, and vampire powers, but more importantly, it lets you pick your vampire outfit. While you can't mix and match pieces, there are 24 outfits in total to choose from. Outfits are unlocked by unlocking new abilities from the skill tree, using ability points.

For the abilities specific to your chosen clan, all you will need to do is earn enough skill points to unlock the skills. For skills from other clans, you will need to earn currency from Blood Resonance activities. There are three types, indicated by the different colors of blue, red, and purple, which correlate to the Bloo
title: All Outfits In Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 And How To Unlock Them

description:
Battlefield 6's first season will begin on October 28, and the developer has released a Season 1 trailer to showcase the game's new content. Season 1 is packed with new game modes, guns, vehicles, and more maps, with one of the new locations adding golf carts for players to drive into combat across a suburban landscape.

The Season 1 trailer kicks off by showing Battlefield 6's new Blackwell Fields map, which is a massive oil field in California. Like other big maps, players will have access to helicopters, planes, and tanks to cause massive destruction. Blackwell Fields will be the first map to arrive in Season 1, and it also introduces the game's new vehicle called Traverser Mark 2. Blackwell Fields also arrives with three guns: the SOR-300SC carbine, the GGH-22 sidearm, and the Mini Scout sniper rifle.

Season 1 also i
title: Battlefield 6 Season 1 Trailer Shows Off New Maps, Golf Carts, And Plenty Of Explosions
Test Your Pokemon Skills With These Electronic Trainer Mission Games

description:
With almost two weeks on the market now, it's likely you encountered a bot or two in your online matches while playing Battlefield 6. Well, the team plans to reduce the number of bots filling the lobbies with a new update planned for PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

Battlefield Studios--a collection of EA teams working on the Battlefield franchise that includes Criterion, DICE, Motive, and Ripple Effect--took to X on October 21 to share the news. In the brief post, the developers explained that "several backend updates" are coming to facilitate more players and fewer bots in the servers.

We’re in the pr
title: Upcoming Battlefield 6 Update Aims To Shoot Down Bot-Filled Matches

description:
Borderlands 4 was one of the most-anticipated titles of 2025, and that helped carry the title to a record launch last month. According to Circana, Borderlands 4 didn't just set a franchise record in September, it also became the third highest-selling video game in the US for 2025.

Circana's Mat Piscatella‬ shared the sales charts for September 2025 in the US, and Borderlands 4 topped the Xbox Series X|S and PC charts, while coming in at No. 3 on PlayStation's list. Specific sales numbers weren't included in the charts, but Piscatella noted that Borderlands 4 "generated the highest launch month dollar sales of any title in franchise history, nearly 30% higher than the previous best, Borderlands 3."

However, it remains to be seen if that momentum was retained in October. PC playe
title: Borderlands 4 Had The Biggest Launch In Franchise History In The US

description:
On the way


Microsoft has announced the second wave of Xbox Game Pass additions for this month (and into early November). The headliners are a couple of notable sequels: The Outer Worlds 2 and PowerWash Simulator 2. They're joined by six other titles, as well as two games now included with Game Pass Premium.

PowerWash Simulator 2 arrives October 23 for the subscription service. One of the nicest new features for the game is the inclusion of shared progression in online co-op. That means when you join a friend's game of cleaning up an area, any work you do is clocked in your own campaign as well. For more, check out GameSpot's PowerWash Simulator 2 review.

Meanwhile,
title: Xbox Game Pass Adding 8 New Games, Including The Outer Worlds 2

description: Check out 10 minutes of Battlefield 6 Season 1 gameplay featuring two new maps Blackwell: Fields Badlands and Golden State Hidden Threat. We showcase both maps with Conquest on Blackwell: Fields Badlands and Escalation on Golden State Hidden Threat. Get a glimpse of some goofy golf cart gameplay in Battlefield 6 on Eastwood.
title: 10 Minutes Of Battlefield 6 Season 1 New Maps Gameplay (Blackwell Fields and Eastwood)

description:
Marvel Cosmic Invasion will officially launch on December 1, and two more characters are joining its roster. Tribute Games and developer Dotemu revealed that Phoenix and Iron Man will team up with fellow heroes like Captain America, She-Hulk, Wolverine, and Spider-Man, increasing the total number of playable heroes to 15. Phoenix--X-man Jean Grey's cosmic powerhouse alter-ego--can dish out telekinetic blasts, while Iron Man uses bleeding-edge technology to clear the field of enemies.

First revealed at Summer Game Fest earlier this year, Marvel Cosmic Invasion sees Earth's mightiest mortals take on Annihilus as he launches a new campaign to take over the galaxy. Dotemu had previously worked on another licensed property, the well-received Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge for PC and console.
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion Gets December Launch Date and New Trailer Introducing Iron Man And Phoenix

description:
The immensely popular Helldivers 2 has been having a rough go at things lately, what with the co-op shooter's latest update causing myriad headaches for everyone. A patch meant to address many of the bugs plaguing Helldivers 2--both in the game and in the code--was slated to arrive on October 21, but it's been delayed until either Friday, October 24, or sometime next week due to some unspecified "last-minute certification issue."

Developer Arrowhead Game Studios took to Helldivers 2's official Discord server to deliver the news. The studio wouldn't clarify
title: Helldivers 2's Upcoming Patch Delayed Due To "Last-Minute Certification Issue"

description:
In a recent interview, game creator Hideo Kojima kicked off a firestorm on social media as he shared his thoughts on the future of the industry. Kojima warned that relying too heavily on remaking old franchises is creatively risky and that, in the future, AI will likely be used to create these kinds of projects.

Kojima has already said he doesn’t see AI as a threat, though. Instead, he believes it can be a helpful tool for handling repetitive tasks, allowing human creators to focus on more imaginative work. Kojima explained that he sees AI as a "friend" in development, one that improves efficiency without replacing human leadership in creativity.
title: Kojima Says AI Could Shape The Future Of Games, But Silent Hill F Producer Strongly Disagrees

description:
While Pikmin fans might not be getting a new game anytime soon, an upcoming update should give them some reasons to jump back into Pikmin 4.

Coming on an unspecified date this November, the update will add some attractive features to Pikmin 4, most notably a camera mode and difficulty modes that will make the Nintendo Switch game easier or harder.

With the new Field Camera tool, players can snap in-game photos and fully customize them with stamps, frames, and filters. Pikmin 3 featured a camera tool, but the field camera in Pikmin 4 looks more in line with camera modes in most modern games.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Pikmin 4 To Add Camera Mode And Super Cute New Pikmin In Free Update

description: PowerWash Sim was a breakout hit in 2021, and the sequel is a reminder of how that happened, though sometimes it feels like it's just punching in for work.
title: Power Wash Simulator 2 - Review

description:
While PowerWash Simulator 2 may be a mostly breezy, relaxing game about cleaning things, that doesn't mean it lacks some challenges for you to consider when starting some of its jobs. While these challenges don't provide any in-game rewards, they'll earn you trophies or achievements, giving you a little something extra to think about when tackling a new job. They're mostly easy to accomplish, too, so they'll never ask you to do anything too outrageous in this otherwise casual title.

If you want to earn every trophy or achievement in PowerWash Simulator 2, here are all of the job-specific hidden challenges and how to complete them.


Hit the Lights (Campfire)
title: PowerWash Simulator 2 - All Hidden Job Challenges And How To Complete Them

description:
Zen Buddhist monk and personal hero of mine, Thich Nhat Hanh, spent much of his life writing about mindfulness. He stressed that when we do anything, we should commit to it fully, giving it our undivided attention and allowing ourselves to become immersed in it, be it simply eating, walking, or anything else. "Drink your tea slowly and reverently," he said, "as if it is the axis on which the earth revolves--slowly, evenly, without rushing toward the future."

Like its predecessor, PowerWash Simulator 2 is a stage on which one can play out Thich Nhat Hanh's message. The simple pleasures of washing away the grime from dozens of walls, floors, cars, and couches act like an on-ramp to a flow state. For a while, I let the sequel wash over me, giving it my entire being and enjoying it thoroughly. But long before I sprayed away the last patch of mildew, I was back to my old ways, multitasking my w
title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Review - Working Overtime

description:
Alan Wake developer Remedy Entertainment has confirmed that CEO Tero Virtala has stepped down, effective immediately. The announcement came just days after Remedy confirmed that the studio's latest release, FBC: Firebreak, had "weak" sales and that the company would incur a profit hit.

Virtala was Remedy's CEO since 2016. A search is now underway for a new CEO, Remedy said, and for the time bing, Virtala will "continue at the service of the company" as part of the handover process.

Remedy co-founder Markus Mäki is taking over as interim CEO. He is vacating his position as chairman of the board and will be replaced in that position by Henri Österlund.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Remedy CEO Steps Down After FBC: Firebreak Comes Up Short

description:
While artificial intelligence is ubiquitous these days, Palworld developer Pocketpair isn't too interested in the technology, with the Japanese studio's publishing boss saying that the team doesn't believe in generative AI and won't work with game makers who use it.

In an October 21 interview with Game Developer at Gamescom Asia, Pocketpair's communications director and publishing manager John Buckley explained that, while the studio's newly established publishing division is happy to work with game makers of all backgrounds and skillsets, the use of generative AI is a deal-breaker.

"People are going to say I'm lying, but these are just the hard facts. We don't believe in it," he said. "We're very upfront about it. If you're big on AI stuff or your game is Web3 or use
title: Palworld Dev's Publishing Arm Won't Work With GenAI Games

description:
PowerWash Simulator 2 launches on October 23, and like the first game, players can expect a mix of paid and free post-launch DLC. Developer FuturLab says it's first focusing on fixes, further optimization, and quality-of-life improvements for the rest of 2025, and new game content will roll out through 2026.

In total, there'll be three "paid IP" DLC and three free jobs as part of the Caldera Chronicles, FuturLab says. Alongside bug fixes and new cosmetics, the studio is also planning community events for PowerWash Simulator 2.

We have our PowerWash Simulator 2 Roadmap to share with you all 💦 Coming in 2025/2026 ⤵️ - 3 Paid IP DLC - 3 Free
title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Will Get Three Paid DLC Crossover Packs In 2026

description:
See ya


Microsoft has announced the next slate of titles set for removal from the Xbox Game Pass library, and the good news is that the list isn't long.

A total of three games are heading out the door on October 31, including Jusant, Metal Slug Tactics, and Return to Monkey Island. This is the second wave of removals for October, after four titles left the catalog earlier this month, bringing the total number of games cut from Game Pass in October to seven.

In terms of additions to Game Pass for the remainder of October, members can get PowerWash Simulator 2 on October 23 as a day-one new release, while Bounty Star releases the same day as a day-one launch. On October 24, Game Pass adds yet an
title: Game Pass Dumps These Games Very Soon

description:
A former Bethesda designer has some theories on why Starfield didn't take off the same way the company's other marquee RPG franchises did.

Speaking to FRVR, developer Bruce Nesmith, who worked as a systems designer for Starfield before leaving Bethesda in 2021, complimented the space-set RPG, while opining that it didn't reach the same heights as The Elder Scrolls or Fallout.

"I think it’s a good game," Nesmith said. "I don’t think it’s in the same calibre as the other two, you know, Fallout or Skyrim, or Elder Scrolls rather, but I think it’s a good game." Nesmith added that he remains proud of the work that he and his former colleagues contributed to the game.
title: Starfield Designer Says Game Fell Short Of Fallout And Elder Scrolls, Calls Space "Inherently Boring"
Amazon Has Tons Of Horror Movie Box Sets For Low Prices In Halloween Sale

description:
A veteran high-ranking game developer has sounded off on the use of artificial intelligence systems in gaming, saying developers who fail to adopt the technology run the risk of selling themselves short. Speaking to IGN, former Sony Santa Monica director of product development Meghan Morgan Juinio said AI is a "tool" and "something that will augment" human creators, not replace them.

"At least for right now, that's how I see it. It's going to evolve whether you're on board with it or not, so I want to be at the forefront of helping to guide how that goes and how we use it," Juinio said.

She added: "I think if we don't embrace it, I think we're selling ourselves short."
title: Devs Who Don't Embrace AI Are Selling Themselves Short, Ex-God Of War Dev Says

description:
With the PS5 turning five years old in November, discussion about its successor has begun to intensify. Sony and AMD recently spoke about new technological breakthroughs that it was pioneering, and former SIE Worldwide Studios president Shuhei Yoshida has shared his thoughts on the rumored PS6 and how Sony needs to do more than just chase graphics for its next-generation console.

Speaking on the Friends Per Second podcast, Yoshida explained how the graphical capabilities of current-gen hardware were starting to hit a wall and that the company needs to start thinking beyond pure graphical power to attract a wide audience. "PlayStation--in my mind--they can
title: Former PlayStation Boss Says PS6 Can't Rely On Power And Graphics Alone

description:
PS5 console owners can grab a fresh firmware update for the console--Version: 25.07-12.20.00--and alongside the usual stability upgrades, there are also a few other tweaks being made to the hardware. Anyone who wants to check the serial number of their console and DualSense controller can now do so, as Sony says the update adds this option.

Beyond that, stability improvements have also been made to the DualSense Edge wireless controller, messages and usability on some screens have been enhanced, and system performance has also been brushed up. Here's a closer look at the brief update notes from Sony:

PS5 Version: 25.07-12.20.00 update notes

  • You can now use your console to check the serial number of your console, and of DualSense wireless controllers that are currently connected by USB or Bluetooth
    • For your console, select Settings >
title: New PS5 Update Is Out Now, Does Something Unexpected

description:
After years of clamoring for the GameCube library to come to Nintendo Switch Online, the Nintendo Switch 2 adds the console and a few games to the Nintendo Classics collection. The GameCube library is now available as part of the Nintendo Switch 2 launch.

The supported games feature a higher resolution than the original releases, and players can customize the controls as well. There is also a wireless controller designed after the original GameCube controller that offers a C button, and can also be used for non-GameCube games. There's a fun GameCube Easter egg when you start up the app that will be of interest to original GameCube owners.

These GameCu
title: Every GameCube Game Coming To Switch 2's Switch Online Library
